name: ImageIcon
desc: An icon that comes from an [ImageProvider], e.g. an [AssetImage].

fields.name: image
fields.desc: The image to display as the icon.

fields.name: size
fields.desc: The size of the icon in logical pixels.

fields.name: color
fields.desc: The color to use when drawing the icon.

nodes.name: Used to display a solid color image
